news1.title: Raptors win first NBA title, knocking off Warriors in six games
news1.synopsis: OAKLAND, Calif. — After waiting 24 long years and enduring one of the most excruciating seconds imaginable, Canada finally got its first taste of NBA glory.

news2.title: Amazon sued over Alexa child recordings in US
news2.synopsis: Amazon is being sued over its smart assistant's recordings of children.

news3.title: Doomsday By 2050 If We Don’t Fight Climate Change Now, Report Warns
news3.synopsis: Opposing sides of the political spectrum continue to argue, as climate change continues to ravage the planet.

news4.title: We will never see another NBA champion like these Toronto Raptors again.
news4.synopsis: Enjoy this one, Canada. Game 6 of the 2019 NBA Finals was a remarkable night of basketball, and the Toronto Raptors are a remarkable basketball team.

news5.title: Stop Array.forEach and start using filter, map, some, reduce functions.
news5.synopsis: There are lot of advantages of using specific methods over generic forEach version.
